text:
A 20-year-old woman allegedly committed suicide by consuming poison here on Friday. The victim, Chandralekha, was five months pregnant. According to the police, Chandralekha was married to Prakash two years ago. Prakash was employed in a textile unit in Tirupur. The family alleged that Chandralekha had wanted to join her husband in Tirupur.

RDO inquiry has been ordered into the death.
title: Pregnant woman commits suicide
